```json
{
    "ability": "Gulp Missile",
    "effect": "When the Pokémon uses Surf or Dive, it catches a prey. When hit by a move, it spits the prey at the attacker, dealing damage and potentially causing a status effect.",
    "synergies": ["Cramorant's signature ability", "Surf/Dive moves", "Defensive pivoting"],
    "notes": "The prey caught is either an Arrokuda (lowers target's Defense by 1 stage) or a Pikachu (paralyzes target), depending on Cramorant's HP when using Surf/Dive."
}
```
